law.catch_line: Central clearinghouse for information on Kentucky authors.
law.text: The Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives shall establish and maintain, as funds permit, a central clearinghouse for information on Kentucky authors, including a statewide locator index of works and collections held by libraries in Kentucky.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990.
